title: Google\Cloud\VideoIntelligence\V1\SpeechRecognitionAlternative
name: SpeechRecognitionAlternative
description:
Alternative hypotheses (a.k.a. n-best list).

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.videointelligence.v1.SpeechRecognitionAlternative

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.transcript
params.description: Transcript text representing the words that the user spoke.

params.name: data.confidence
params.description: Output only. The confidence estimate between 0.0 and 1.0. A higher number indicates an estimated greater likelihood that the recognized words are correct. This field is set only for the top alternative. This field is not guaranteed to be accurate and users should not rely on it to be always provided. The default of 0.0 is a sentinel value indicating confidence was not set.

params.name: data.words
params.description: Output only. A list of word-specific information for each recognized word. Note: When enable_speaker_diarization is set to true, you will see all the words from the beginning of the audio.

methods.name: getTranscript
methods.description:
Transcript text representing the words that the user spoke.
